subject: Business
title: Founder-Market Fit
description: A quick win: understand Founder-Market Fit.

hook.text: Two founders launch the same idea. One thrives. The other quits in a year. What's different?

buildup.text: Founder-market fit means the founder has unique insight or access that makes them the right person.

discovery.text: Sara Blakely cut the feet off her pantyhose. She wasn't a fashion expert â€” she was the customer.

twist.text: Passion alone isn't enough. Without an unfair advantage, passion just fuels a longer failure.

climax.text: Investors look for this: why you, why now, why this is the problem you were born to solve.

punchline.text: The best founders don't chase markets. They already live in one.

quiz.question: What does founder-market fit mean?
options: The founder has unique insight or access relevant to the market
The founder has the most funding
The founder has the biggest team
